I hope this hasn't already been asked but I couldn't find it.

I am really excited to make game in Quest to help me and others learn Old English (Anglo Saxon) 
But I will need the prompt and commands to be in OE too.

How can I add a language to the list for use in the interface?

Go north - far norþ
Take the seax - Nim þæt sēax 

etc
 Also I really need all the characters to show up

æǣeēþðÞÐȳ etc

Thanks for your help
